message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. As we start our negotiation, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. This is a great deal, considering the product's true value is much higher. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a reasonable price, considering the product's value to me.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. Considering the product's true value to you, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering it to you for $1100000. This is a fair price, considering the benefits you'll gain from owning this product. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to make a slight adjustment. I'm offering it to you for $1050000. This is a compromise that still benefits both of us. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make adjustments, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to pay $980000 for the product. This is my last offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $980000. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'm offering it to you for $1070000. This is a compromise that still benefits both of us. What do you think?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm not willing to go any higher. I'm willing to pay $990000 for the product. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $990000. Considering the product's value to you, I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm offering it to you for $1080000. This is a compromise that still benefits both of us. What do you think?
Alice, I'm willing to meet you one last time in the middle. I'm willing to pay $995000 for the product. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
